Question: This person had two children who survived infancy.
Hints: This person gave a speech at Saint Anselm College on May 5, 1960, regarding America's conduct in the emerging Cold War.
In July 1937 this person sailed to France—bringing his convertible—and spent ten weeks driving through Europe with Billings.
this person was sworn in as the 35th President at noon on January 20, 1961.
